partnerDetails.about:
BN Automation AG is a leading solution provider for automation, data and information technology. With the interdisciplinary mastery of these technologies and a great real net output ratio, we offer our customers fitting solutions for demanding challenges in the sectors of water, energy and industry. Whether in the supply of pure drinking water, the generation of energy from renewable raw materials or in the production of high-quality food – our automation solutions stand for the economical, safe and environmentally friendly production of many essential goods.

Our goal is to secure your investments and ensure their lasting success. This is why we have a comprehensive package of after-sales services for you.

Our range of maintenance and after-sales services covers all components and all levels of an automation solution, from field devices, switchgear, PLC and process control technology through to operational data management systems. Whether preventive maintenance or reactive repairs, even with 24x7 on-call standby, guaranteed response time and stocking of spare parts – our after-sales service team will be happy to meet your needs.

When it comes to service, people make the difference. On completion of each project, we therefore appoint a person who is responsible for the respective plant and is the permanent and fixed contact person for our customer.
